description:
Queen uses a new version of the Plague Bullets which will turn the samurai into ogre-like monsters. Meanwhile, the Minks keep pushing the fight against the Gifters and drive Jack into a corner. However, Kaido stands up for his subordinate.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Heroic Blade! Akazaya vs. Kaido, Again Once More!
Die Klinge der Heroen! – Die Akazayas vs. Kaido, Runde zwei
Hisou no Yaiba! Akazaya vs Kaidou Futatabi
Tragique héroïsme. Les Fourreaux rouges contre Kaido, le retour
Героические клинки! Реванш «Алых Ножен» против Кайдо!
نصل بطوليّ! الأكازايا ضدّ كايدو مرّة أخرى!
悲壮の刃! 赤鞘VSカイドウ再び
